H0.text: Rene Belloq is the arch enemy of which movie hero in his first film. Rick O'Connell

H1.text: Rene Belloq is the arch enemy of which movie hero in his first film. Allan Quatermain

H2.text: Rene Belloq is the arch enemy of which movie hero in his first film. Lara Croft

H3.text: Rene Belloq is the arch enemy of which movie hero in his first film. Indy Jones

A4.text: Belloq was intended to be a sophisticated villain to counter the 'beer-drinking' hero.

A5.text: Belloq suggests he is a skewed reflection of Jones, and only a small change would turn Jones into Belloq.
